com.yantra.yfc.rcp.internal

Class YRCTableNavigationController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.yantra.yfc.rcp.internal.YRCTableNavigationController

  • public class YRCTableNavigationController
extends java.lang.Object
    YRCTableNavigationController is a manager class which controls the table navigation. Basically, it uses the control editor's features and events effectively.
    Supported Controls:
    Text, Combo, Check
    Events:
    Table focus event
    Cursor selection, traversal, mouse events
    Cell focus, traversal events
    See Also:
    ControlEditor, TableCursor, TableViewer
